definition: a wantonly cruel act, strike with disgust or revulsion
details:
noun
- a wantonly cruel act
- the act of scandalizing
= synonyms: scandalization, scandalisation
- a disgraceful event
= synonyms: scandal
- a feeling of righteous anger
= synonyms: indignation
verb
- strike with disgust or revulsion
= synonyms: shock, appal, appall, offend, scandalise, scandalize
- force (someone) to have sex against their will
= synonyms: assault, rape, dishonor, dishonour, ravish
- violate the sacred character of a place or language
= synonyms: profane, desecrate
